text: Jan-Erik Fjell (born 1982), is a Norwegian novelist. He was born in Fredrikstad. He made his literary debut with the novel Pus in 2009. His crime novel Tysteren, with detective "Anton Brekke", was awarded the Norwegian Booksellers' Prize for 2010. Further crime novels are Skyggerom (2012), Hevneren (2013), Rovdyret (2014) and Lykkejegeren (2016). ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Fredrikstad Category:Norwegian male novelists Category:Norwegian crime fiction writers Category:21st-century Norwegian novelists Category:21st-century Norwegian male writers
title: Jan-Erik Fjell
